course_description: Introduction to statistical analysis for managerial decision making. Introduces methods of data description, statistical inference, statistical modeling, and statistical decision theory. Methods applied to practical business problems.
prerequisites: MATH_OX 117 or MATH 207/MATH_OX 207 or MATH 362 or ECON 220/ECON_OX 220 or QTM 100/QTM_OX 100 or QTM 110/QTM_OX 110 or SOC 275 or QTM 999XFR or QTM_OX ELEC as prereq. SPECSTUBUS stud.can enroll. Students enrolled or who took ISOM 350 can't take BUS 350.
